gold.user: Admin user resets the system to clear all data for testing.
gold.ideal: System successfully reset.

gold.user: User retrieves details of a specific garage chain using its ID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the garage chain with the specified ID.

gold.user: A manager adds a new garage to the system with necessary details.
gold.ideal: Garage created successfully with a unique ID.

gold.user: A manager updates the information of an existing garage.
gold.ideal: Garage information updated successfully.

gold.user: A support agent retrieves a list of all customers in the system.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all customers with their details.

gold.user: An admin removes a customer from the system using their ID.
gold.ideal: Customer deleted successfully.

gold.user: A mechanic checks the details of a car using its VIN.
gold.ideal: Returns the car details associated with the provided VIN.

gold.user: A service advisor schedules periodic maintenance for a customer's vehicle.
gold.ideal: Periodic maintenance scheduled successfully.

gold.user: A service advisor updates the details of a scheduled maintenance.
gold.ideal: Periodic maintenance details updated successfully.

gold.user: A manager retrieves all active repair orders in the system.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all active repair orders.

gold.user: An admin deletes a specific repair order using its ID.
gold.ideal: Repair order deleted successfully.

gold.user: Admin user creating a new garage chain.
gold.ideal: A new garage chain is successfully created with a unique ID.

gold.user: Admin user updating the details of an existing garage chain.
gold.ideal: The garage chain details are updated successfully.

gold.user: User retrieving a list of all garages in the system.
gold.ideal: A list of all garages is returned with their details.

gold.user: Admin user deleting a specific garage from the system.
gold.ideal: The specified garage is successfully deleted.

gold.user: User looking up details for a specific customer.
gold.ideal: The customer's details are returned successfully.

gold.user: User adding a new car to the system.
gold.ideal: The new car is successfully added with a unique VIN.

gold.user: User updating the details of an existing car.
gold.ideal: The car details are updated successfully.

gold.user: User retrieving a list of all scheduled periodic maintenance tasks.
gold.ideal: A list of all periodic maintenance tasks is returned.

gold.user: Admin user removing a specific periodic maintenance task.
gold.ideal: The specified periodic maintenance task is successfully deleted.

gold.user: User checking the details of a specific repair order.
gold.ideal: The repair order details are returned successfully.

gold.user: Admin user approving a specific repair order.
gold.ideal: The repair order is successfully approved.

gold.user: As a user, I want to retrieve a list of all garage chains available in the system so that I can choose one for my service needs.
gold.ideal: The response should return a JSON array of garage chains, including their IDs, names, and locations.

gold.user: As an admin, I want to delete a specific garage chain by its ID so that I can manage the chains in the system effectively.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the deletion of the chain and return a success message.

gold.user: As a customer, I want to get details about a specific garage by its ID so that I can understand the services they offer.
gold.ideal: The response should include the garage's name, address, services offered, and contact information.

gold.user: As a new user, I want to create a customer account so that I can book services and manage my vehicle information.
gold.ideal: The response should return the newly created customer's ID and a success message.

gold.user: As a customer, I want to update my account information so that my details are current and accurate.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the update and return the updated customer information.

gold.user: As a customer, I want to retrieve a list of my registered cars so that I can manage their maintenance schedules.
gold.ideal: The response should return a JSON array of cars with their details including make, model, and VIN.

gold.user: As a customer, I want to remove a car from my account by its VIN so that I can keep my account organized.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the deletion of the car and return a success message.

gold.user: As a customer, I want to view the details of a specific periodic maintenance schedule so that I can keep track of my car's service needs.
gold.ideal: The response should include the maintenance type, schedule, and any recommended services.

gold.user: As a customer, I want to create a repair order for my car so that I can get the necessary repairs done.
gold.ideal: The response should return the newly created repair order ID and a success message.

gold.user: As a customer, I want to update my existing repair order so that I can modify the requested services.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the update and return the updated repair order details.

gold.user: As a customer, I want to close my repair order once the services are completed so that I can finalize the transaction.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the closure of the repair order and provide a summary of the services performed.
